pond_animals.source_phrase: you might see just a few animals at the pond.
pond_animals.example_en: A few ducks were swimming in the pond.
pond_animals.example_vi: Một vài con vịt đang bơi trong ao.

pond_animals.source_phrase: you might see just a few animals at the pond
pond_animals.meaning_en: a small body of still water formed naturally or by hollowing or embanking
pond_animals.example_en: The pond was full of fish and frogs.
pond_animals.example_vi: Cái ao đầy cá và ếch.

pond_animals.source_phrase: once you look for a while, you will see a lot!
pond_animals.meaning_en: as soon as, or from the moment when
pond_animals.example_vi: Một khi bạn đến, hãy gọi tôi.

pond_animals.source_phrase: once you look for a while, you will see a lot!
pond_animals.meaning_en: to observe or search for a period of time
pond_animals.meaning_vi: nhìn một lúc, quan sát một lúc
pond_animals.example_en: If you look for a while, you'll notice many birds.
pond_animals.example_vi: Nếu bạn quan sát một lúc, bạn sẽ thấy nhiều chim.

pond_animals.source_phrase: once you look for a while, you will see a lot!
pond_animals.meaning_en: to observe or notice many things
pond_animals.meaning_vi: thấy nhiều, quan sát được nhiều
pond_animals.example_en: You can see a lot if you visit the zoo.
pond_animals.example_vi: Bạn có thể thấy nhiều nếu bạn đến thăm sở thú.

pond_animals.source_phrase: look for an animal diving into the pond for food.
pond_animals.meaning_en: moving quickly downward into something, typically water
pond_animals.example_en: The bird was diving into the water to catch fish.
pond_animals.example_vi: Con chim lặn xuống nước để bắt cá.

pond_animals.source_phrase: look for an animal diving into the pond for food.
pond_animals.example_en: The bear was searching for food in the forest.
pond_animals.example_vi: Con gấu đang tìm thức ăn trong rừng.

pond_animals.source_phrase: you can see just the head of one animal
pond_animals.meaning_en: the upper part of the body in animals, containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs
pond_animals.example_en: The turtle poked its head out of the water.
pond_animals.example_vi: Con rùa thò đầu ra khỏi mặt nước.

pond_animals.source_phrase: find the tiny bugs that hold on to plants and animals
pond_animals.meaning_en: to grasp or cling to something
pond_animals.example_en: The insect can hold on to the leaf tightly.
pond_animals.example_vi: Con côn trùng có thể bám chặt vào chiếc lá.
